body:
Whatever the correct or preferred behaviour is I would request that the documentation for filepath.Join be made clearer.

There's an ambiguity on the behaviour of filepath.Join("a:",x) as to whether an absolute or relative path is returned. I could look at the code, but that's not the point.

 the docs state ".adding a Separator if necessary.." - in the ambiguous case a separator isn't necessary.

Better to state "adding a separator between all elements" (for the current behaviour)
